sentences.en: A bank of telephoto lenses homed in on him.
sentences.cn: 一整排的远摄镜头都对准了他。

sentences.en: Before getting out of the way , Steininger captured this digital photo with a 500 mm telephoto lens.
sentences.cn: 就在弯腰躲避它之前, 斯坦林格用500毫米的数码相机镜头抓拍下了这张照片.

sentences.en: His name for it was phono - telephoto.
sentences.cn: 当时,他给电视机起的名字是“ phono -telephoto”.

sentences.en: I commonly use the Olympus 100 millimeter telephoto lens.
sentences.cn: i普遍使用奥林巴斯100毫米远摄镜头.

sentences.en: If you always shoot with - angle or normal lens, maybe it's time to try a telephoto.
sentences.cn: 如果你总是使用 广角 或者普通的镜头, 或许可以试试长焦.

sentences.en: One limiting factor is the viewing angle, which is comparable to using a camera lens: a telephoto lens has a narrower view than a wide-angle lens.
sentences.cn: 限制因素之一就是观察角度，这与使用照相机的情况类似：长焦镜头的视野比广角镜头的观察角度要窄得多。

sentences.en: Perhaps there’ll be 16GB telephoto or 32GB zoom lenses available in the future.
sentences.cn: 或许今后还会有16GB的“摄远镜头”或32GB的“全景镜头”可供选择。

sentences.en: S : Yes, some of them include a built - in zoom lens with wide - angle and telephoto settings.
sentences.cn: 可以, 有些自动机具备 广角 镜及远摄镜功能的内 置 变焦镜.

sentences.en: Still another kind of effect is apparent when you look through a telephoto lens.
sentences.cn: 另外使用望远镜头的效果也很特别.

sentences.en: Telephoto - type SLR cameras have a similar appearance, and more portable than the fuselage and zoom features.
sentences.cn: 长焦型相机有着近似单反相机的外型, 更加便携的机身和大变焦比的特性.

sentences.en: When shooting in wildness, photographers usually shoot with long telephoto lenses from a distance.
sentences.cn: 野外拍摄时, 一般都在远处使用长焦镜头.

sentences.en: You may use a zoom or telephoto lens on your camera.
sentences.cn: 你可以在照相机上安装可变距镜头或摄远镜头.

words.tran_cn: 望远镜的；[眼科] 远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的
[摄] 远距离照相术；[通信] 传真电报术
[通信] 电传打字机，电传打字电报机
传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头

phrases.tran_cn: 远距镜头；长焦镜头；望远透镜

trans.tran_cn: 电传照相，远距摄影照片
